description: Application submitted under Section 73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) for minor-material amendments for the variation of Conditions (2), (9), (13) & (23) in connection with appeal decision APP/C5690/W/23/3317236 (DC/22/127818) dated 14/11/2023 in order to allow: reconfiguration of ground, first and second floor layouts to improve residential quality,  western and eastern elevation fenestration amendments to reflect internal changes; replacement of hung tiles on first and second floors of northern elevation to matching brickwork; realignment of southern boundary wall away from common boundary; housing mix changed from 5 x 3 bed units to 1 x 3 bed units and 4 x 4 bed units resulting in uplift in GIA of 10sqm and habitable rooms of 4 at Land to the rear of, 55 Broseley Grove SE26 .
site_name: LAND TO THE REAR OF, 55 BROSELEY GROVE, LONDON, SE26 5LD
